title: Purification Essential Oil is another very common oil blend made up of Citronella, Lemongrass, Rosemary...

attachments.displayName: Purification Essential Oil is another very common oil blend made up of Citronella, Lemongrass, Rosemary, Malaleuca, Lavandin, and Myrtle and is a great oil to use as an air purifier it helps eliminate many smells from smoke to onions, even smelly shoes! My favorite use for Purification is to use it as a bug repellent and on insect bites, we never know what harmful chemicals are really in traditional bug repellents and how they can effect us or our children. This oil can also be used on skin blemishes, sore throat, blisters and flu. Has your dog or cat ever had ear mites? Purification put directly on the base of their ear will clear that up quickly!

object.content: Purification Essential Oil is another very common oil blend made up of Citronella, Lemongrass, Rosemary, Malaleuca, Lavandin, and Myrtle and is a great oil to use as an air purifier it helps eliminate many smells from smoke to onions, even smelly shoes! My favorite use for Purification is to use it as a bug repellent and on insect bites, we never know what harmful chemicals are really in traditional bug repellents and how they can effect us or our children.  This oil can also be used on skin blemishes, sore throat, blisters and flu.  Has your dog or cat ever had ear mites?  Purification put directly on the base of their ear will clear that up quickly!
